item.title: Pam Bondi’s First Amendment Follies
item.description: The attorney general’s statements get things wrong in an alarming way that suggests she doesn’t understand the basics of the U.S. Constitution.

item.title: What’s Wrong with The History of Sound
item.description: Rewriting the past for political sanctimony.

item.title: Charlie Kirk: A Witness of Faith, Truth, and Courage
item.description: For all his meteoric rise, Charlie Kirk never stopped being a good person.
